Articles.Content:
Hi there!

I was canoeing through the forums a few weeks ago, and saw a mod that allowed you to recover debris parachuted down from space. I thought: "Oh! That's cool!" and canoed right past it. Now I would like to find it again. Does anyone have an idea about what I saw? Or did Jeb's magic shrooms make me see things again ._.

Thanks!

Sneeze

Edited August 20, 2014 by sneezedr424

Never mind! I found it! Here it is, so all of my fellow Kerbonauts can enjoy it!

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/86677-0-24-2-StageRecovery-Recover-Funds-from-Dropped-Stages-v1-4-%288-18-14%29
